text:
No processor available, rejecting this connection
occured always after new server threads started.

I use tomcat with Jboss on a double 1G cpu, 1G mem pc,
there were about 10 users to access at the same time.

error log listed below:

creator: kuding2000@yahoo.com

text:
Either the users keep some connection open, which can cause Catalina to run out 
of procesors (in standalone mode, you can raise the number of processors).

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 5735 ***
creator: remm@apache.org
